content.rendered:
Waterfall Area

34 Freestanding homes located
in the heart of the Waterfall Area.

5 bedroom riverside houses with
an average size of 415m² each.

R46,100pm – R52,800pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Waterfall Area

190 Freestanding homes located
on the apex of the Waterfall Area.

3 and 4 bedroom houses ranging
from 310m² to 401m².

R37,100pm – R51,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Waterfall Area

72 Freestanding homes forming part
of the Waterfall Area community.

3 bedroom houses ranging
from 195m² to 270m².

R27,800pm – R34,500pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Adjacent to Waterfall Area

1,250 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3, and 4-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 38m² to 132m².

R7,000pm – R18,100pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Adjacent to Waterfall Area

1,800 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 32m² to 83m².

R6,900pm – R13,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

OUR LUXURY HOMES AND LIFESTYLE APARTMENTS ARE ON SHOW 7 DAYS A
WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00

Contact Wayne
Contact Darren
Contact Zanele
Contact Terence
Contact Phathi
Contact Wandile
